query:
SELECT
                id,
                COALESCE(NULLIF(name,''), display_name, email, phone, '(không tên)') AS "name!: String",
                display_name,
                email,
                phone,
                is_company,
                NULLIF(tags_cached,'') AS "tags?: String"
            FROM contact
            WHERE tenant_id = $1
              AND ($2::bool IS NULL OR is_company = $2)
            ORDER BY created_at DESC
            LIMIT $3 OFFSET $4
